title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the lightweight server that runs Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with a single CLI and Docker image.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration; use Ollama models as LLM or chat in any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API, streaming, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, delete, copying.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama.cpp wrapper)
summary: Go-based CLI that embeds llama.cpp for CPU+GPU inference; exposes REST API used by all clients.

title: ollama-copilot (vscode extension)
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in open-source replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama; powers CLI code generation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui (Tauri desktop app)
summary: Lightweight cross-platform desktop UI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that adds Ollama-powered code completion, chat and refactoring commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI assistance; generate text, summarize notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin that brings Ollama LLM blocks for Q&A, summarization and brainstorming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings and model management; targets .NET 6+.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Curated community repository of Modelfiles for fine-tuned and niche models ready to pull.
